title: This New Years I'm thankful for Riot Tantram

replies.body: /hugs

Just a small question for you Riot Tantram:

Why is it that you are one of the most active members on the boards?
I'm sure that other Rioters care about the community, and/or are busy with other things, but how come they never respond as much as you do?
also...

> [{quoted}](name=Elohaven,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ko4KZE36,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-31T18:36:56.716+0000)
>
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/OeZ3ipZB-got-a-14-day-suspension-by-a-teammate-on-purpose
> 
> Give this man a trophy.

I've never in my life seen so many players righteously (Or Riotiously) unbanned. You're a miracle worker when it comes to saving innocent players man.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

>Rioteously

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Screw you it was a good joke and I laughed at it no matter how cheesy it was!
_I actually liked it too tell no one_

Your secret is safe with me
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
https://memegenerator.net/img/instances/500x/81007606/praise-riot-tantram.jpg
Omg Tantram is a Tsundere...(happy new years! <3)

You mean like...
He loves all the people he smites about their legit bans or something?
No he's normally all stoic and handing out smites.  But when he shows affection its a simple quiet hug and nothing else.  Tsundere.
Doesn't really seem Tsundere to me...

Just wondering, it says you're Senior software engineer as your flair. Does banning fall into this job (bans system is 'software'), or do you have multiple titles/roles but choose software engineering as your main one? Are there people whose main jobs are to deal with bans but don't go on boards often (cus they don't have the minimum savagery required)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/OeZ3ipZB-got-a-14-day-suspension-by-a-teammate-on-purpose

Give this man a trophy.

>
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/OeZ3ipZB-got-a-14-day-suspension-by-a-teammate-on-purpose

> Give this man a trophy.

Give him a trophy for not upholding the summoners code?  I guess certain people are not responsible for what happens on their account >>
He's the technical lead for the Player Behavior team and explained his actions. It's not against the code. Read the thread and Tantrum's posts.

> [{quoted}](name=Elohaven,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ko4KZE36,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-01-02T21:55:23.840+0000)
>

I did. It goes against their own stated policies. Hence the....rules apply only when we feel like vibe they give off.
can someone give me a TLDR of that thread?

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ko4KZE36,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-01-01T19:57:25.026+0000)

They got bait banned and Tantrum went against the summoners code and riot's own faq and policies to un-banned them and some others.
ty

But... but... Cactopus...
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/614/729/e62.gif
I would like to point out the irony of his name being "Tantram" and being the sole redder on the PB boards.
How about we be thankful for ALL those reds who have posted here, giving insight and smiting? :D
i clicked on red tracker and his name wasnt even on the recent list. Not saying he doesn't post alot, but to say he most active? i donno.
Most active for player behavior.

I'm fairly certain I have seen another Rioter post here, but I don't believe it was a member of the player behavior team (not to diminish Tantram's contributions, it is a shame that there is not an automated chat logs posting system).

There's DuckCurry, NA Kayle, Smirough and Gromp are a few off the top of my head.

But Tantram posts here wayyyyy more often than those guys.
I live for the smites.
